data.name: Charming Apartment 1 bedroom heart 16th in Paris
reviews: Location ₪3,433 ₪2,834 Show price breakdown for 5 nights 5.0 · 8 reviews Rated 5.0 out of 5 from 8 reviews. Reserve Entire rental unit in Paris, France 4 guests · · 1 bedroom · · 2 beds · · 1 bath Rated 5.0 out of 5 stars. 5.0 · 8 reviews Hosted by Michael 6 years hosting Listing highlights Unbeatable location 100% of guests in the past year gave this location a 5-star rating. City view Soak up the view during your stay. Great host communication Recent guests loved Michael's communication. Some info has been automatically translated. Show original Discover this charming Parisian apartment with breathtaking views of the Parisian rooftops and the Eiffel Tower, nestled in the 16th arrondissement, a safe and residential neighborhood. This bright and welcoming apartment, tastefully decorated, is fully equipped for an unforgettable stay with family or friends. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, a comfortable living room, and a cozy bedroom. Ideally located, you'll be close to museums, shops, and public transportation to explore Paris. The space Welcome to this 45 m² apartment, located on the 6th floor without elevator of a beautiful, quiet, and elegant building in the prestigious 16th arrondissement of Paris. It is designed for your comfort: ✔ A beautiful living room with a comfortable sofa bed for 2, TV, and Wi-Fi ✔ A dining area with a table and chairs for 4 people, or a comfortable work area. ✔ A fully equipped open-plan kitchen with a stovetop, oven, microwave, toaster, Nespresso machine, and dishwasher ✔ A separate bathroom with a shower, sink, toilet, and washing machine ✔ Sheets and towels are provided for each guest. ✔ A professional cleaning service is performed before your arrival to ensure your space is spotless and welcoming. ✔ Portable air conditioning 🌟 The discreet charm of the 16th arrondissement, close to shops and public transport Whether you're in Paris for work or leisure, this apartment is the ideal place to enjoy the city from a refined and convenient location. Guest access Travellers have access to the entire flat Other things to note This booking is protected with coverage for lost baggage and emergency medical expenses, provided by Swift Travel Cover with claim up to 750 Euros (T&C Applies). Full details available at booking. data.description: Discover this charming Parisian apartment with breathtaking views of the Parisian rooftops and the Eiffel Tower, nestled in the 16th arrondissement, a safe and residential neighborhood. This bright and welcoming apartment, tastefully decorated, is fully equipped for an unforgettable stay with family or friends. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, a comfortable living room, and a cozy bedroom. Ideally located, you'll be close to museums, shops, and public transportation to explore Paris.
